name: First Draft
goal: First Draft is a project based at the Shorenstein Center for Media, Politics and Public Policy. It is dedicated to finding solutions to trust and truth in a digital world. It focuses on developing experimental journalism projects in the field, particularly collaborative initiatives around monitoring and debunking mis and disinformation during elections.  For example First Draft designed and led the CrossCheck project in France during the 10 week election campaign. First Draft also carries out research on these experimental projects and then builds resources for journalism and the public. The organization is specializes in the verification of images and video that emerge on the social web.
interests: Education, Information Society, Research and Technology
